intro: Bersama subalata, commonly known as the silver leaf tree, is a deciduous tree native to Southeast Asia. It is characterized by its distinctive silver-white leaves that shimmer in sunlight. The plant belongs to the family Euphorbiaceae and is known for its ornamental value. It thrives in tropical and subtropical climates, preferring well-drained soil. The tree produces small, inconspicuous flowers followed by capsule fruits containing seeds.
